name: Space Shifter (zephyr1125)
description:
As a space shifter, you can shift your surrounding to a better place!
Available on PC/Mac, GameShell, DEOT

I have opensourced the code at https://github.com/zephyr1125/SpaceShifter

if you play on PC/Mac:

J = B(cancel)
K = A(confirm)
U = Flip card
Up/Down/Left/Right = change selection
